user.title: Silence Scooter Configuration
user.description: Configure trip detection parameters and electricity tariff.

data.use_tracked_distance: Use manual tracked counters (resettable after scooter mods)

data_description.tariff_sensor: Select your dynamic tariff sensor (or leave sensor.tarif_base_ttc to use the default one)
data_description.use_tracked_distance:
✅ Enabled: Statistics based on manual counters (resettable after scooter prep/mods)
❌ Disabled: Statistics based on global odometer (ODO) and MQTT energy counters
data_description.confirmation_delay: Filters sensor oscillations and network micro-cuts before considering the scooter stopped (recommended: 120s, increase in weak zones)
data_description.pause_max_duration: Max time with scooter OFF before trip ends. Quick errand < 5min = pause, > 5min = end
data_description.watchdog_delay: If no communication during this duration, the trip stops (e.g.: garage without network)

error.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of this integration is allowed
error.confirmation_delay_too_low: Confirmation delay must be at least 30 seconds
error.confirmation_delay_too_high: Confirmation delay cannot exceed 600 seconds (10 minutes)
error.pause_duration_too_low: Pause duration must be at least 1 minute
error.watchdog_delay_too_low: Watchdog delay must be at least 1 minute
error.sensor_not_found: The selected sensor does not exist

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of this integration is allowed
